item.gonefishing.big_red_bobber.tooltip: §7让鱼几乎无法逃脱，但钓到宝藏的几率会变得极低！专为讨厌钓鱼小游戏的玩家设计！（特别是那些抱怨最大声的）
effect.gonefishing.aquatic_mastery.descr: Harness the power of a dolphin for the duration of the effect! Breath underwater, have nightvision and swim faster! Dolphins have monochromatic vision and thus while under this effect you will too!
